Description of incident: Billy Casper Golf has notified customers of a data breach when they were a target of email spoofing attack. Hackers were able to obtain information from individuals W-2 information. The spoofing email appeared as if it was coming from the CEO asking for all 2015 employee W2 information. For those with questions call 877-213-5100 Monday through Friday from 9:00 a.m. to 7 p.m. EST and provide reference number 9416022816.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-60368
